content: every one of the next 3 sts into the last chain of the chain work 3 single_crochet then continue into the unused loops on the opposite side of the chain 4 single_crochet this has yielded 12 single_crochet to visualize the overall shape we have crocheted around all sides of the beginning chain see video here using wire cutters cut 4 pieces of wire each 2 5 cm 1 inch long and bend each one slightly in the middle as shown in the photo apply glue to the bottom of the crocheted strip and press the legs onto it then fold the crocheted strip in half width-wise so that the second half covers up the spot in which the legs have been glued on this has created the spider s head and chest with attached legs for reinforcement additionally fasten with a few sewn stitches sew the head-and-chest part to the body ©2021 anastasia kirsanova / nansyoops ©2021 anastasia kirsanova / nansyoops all rights reserved translation from the russian © 2021 katharina sokiran all rights reserved 5 bend the spider s legs each one in two spots so that the spider can stand if desired two dots may be embroidered to the body with colorful yarn as shown the spider is finished when publishing photos of your finished toys please refer to the designer of the pattern crocheted from a pattern by anastasia kirsanova @nansyoops thank you for respecting copyright and valuing my work you can find me nansyoops com instagram @nansyoops ravelry anastasia-kirs/patterns facebook facebook com/nansyoops ©2021 anastasia kirsanova / nansyoops ©2021 anastasia kirsanova / nansyoops all rights reserved translation from the russian © 2021 katharina sokiran all rights reserved
